name: Bad's Basics in Cubing and Reading. FIRST PROTOTYPE.
name_original: Bad's Basics in Cubing and Reading. FIRST PROTOTYPE.
description:
This is a Baldi's Basics Fan Game made in Unity 3D version 2018. 1.1f1.

To close the game, open your task manager, or press control escape.

You can move with WASD, run with Shift and look around using your mouse. (obviously.)

Windows only.

Warning! DK RAP
